name: Freelancer
description:
Freelancer is a simulation-arcade game developed by Digital Anvil. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Microsoft Studios. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Freelancer on PC.
Chris Parker and Phil Wattenbarger produced the game. It was directed by Chris Parker. Andrew Sega, Bill Munyon, Clark Crawford and James Hannigan scored the game.
